name: Delicious Poisson Seafood Soup
desc: A seafood soup. The buttery soup resembles gilded waves under the bright sun, as the rich seafood aromas melt in your mouth. The bounties of the ocean form a harmonious masterpiece. After emptying the bowl quickly, you can't help but dip the bread in what remains â€” it would be a great loss to miss even one drop of it!

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Recipe: Poisson Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Poisson Seafood Soup.

customize.name: Fish
customize.desc: A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Poisson Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A seafood soup. It originated in the fishing village Poisson. Fishermen used to process leftover fish by stewing them together. This soup then became popular in Fontaine due to its freshness. Nowadays, almost any type of aquatic product can be included in this dish.

customize.name: Suspicious Poisson Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A seafood soup. The only flavor it has is the stench of fish. If your nose is still functioning properly, there must be something wrong with the soup... Ah wait, is it fish scales or gravel that got stuck in your teeth?
